title: Amazing yoga teacher training experience
review: A true immersion into the self through a 28 days journey of intense practice and dedication. A batch of dedicated & passionate teachers who truly reflect the essence of yoga in everything they do. Yashpal is such a genuine & caring teacher, he never rests till every student is comfortable. He constantly encourages you to set a target for your self and enjoy the journey while achieving it. Rajesh is one of the top notch vinyasa teachers in Rishikesh who makes it hard for you to like other classes apart from his.
